about_the_game:
Laundry Service Simulator is a chill first-person simulation where you will experience managing a laundromat with tons of customers (and their dirty clothes).

Get organized! Create the best laundromat design and manage your place. Show your cleaning mastery with the perfect laundry where you welcome your customers.

Zero to hero! Buy high-tech machines and wash all your laundry better, faster. Expand your equipment from cheap machines to turbo washers.

Out of detergent? Always supply lot of washing powder and and don't forget to try super-cleaning chemicals!

It's simple. The more cleanliness, the more money. So the more dirty clothes, the more cash!

Break the walls! Open up new spaces and make room for more machines and customers in your laundry.

In Laundry Service Simulator, as in every laundromat, customer satisfaction is neccesary. You have to keep everything clean, buy new machines, set good service prices and grow your laundry to avoid going bankrupt.

Get organized! Create the best laundromat design and manage your place. Show your cleaning mastery with the perfect laundry where you welcome your customers.

Zero to hero! Buy high-tech machines and wash all your laundry better, faster. Expand your equipment from cheap machines to turbo washers.

Out of detergent? Always supply lot of washing powder and and don't forget to try super-cleaning chemicals!

It's simple. The more cleanliness, the more money. So the more dirty clothes, the more cash!

Break the walls! Open up new spaces and make room for more machines and customers in your laundry.

In Laundry Service Simulator, as in every laundromat, customer satisfaction is neccesary. You have to keep everything clean, buy new machines, set good service prices and grow your laundry to avoid going bankrupt.
name: Laundry Service Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700K or AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660S, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT, 6 GB

short_description: Turn your place from a tiny laundromat into a big laundry service center! You will need to buy new machines, deliver orders fast, upgrade your equipment and keep everything clean to avoid going bankrupt. Laundry design, employees, deep dry clean and security are coming up.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Greek, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch
